name: VZFileHandleSerialPortAttachment
desc: An attachment point that allows bidirectional communication using file handles.

items.name: init(fileHandleForReading: FileHandle?, fileHandleForWriting: FileHandle?)
items.desc: Creates a serial port attachment object from the specified file handles.

items.name: var fileHandleForReading: FileHandle?
items.desc: The file handle that the guest operating system uses to read data.

items.name: var fileHandleForWriting: FileHandle?
items.desc: The file handle that the guest operating system uses to write data.
